name: Flufftopia
description:
Flufftopia is a cute little clicker game with a story. Help Flufftown to grow and eventually become Flufftopia! But wait… could there be even more?

Your host Happy would love to accompany you and give advice!

A playthrough of the story of Flufftopia takes around 30 minutes to complete.

It's free and localized in English and German.

Key Features

- A rich story

- Several endings

- Cute graphics

- English and German localization

SmokeSomeFrogs

This is our second project after Intra-System: Trust Issues.

For further information check out our website or Twitter. You can also subscribe to our Newsletter if you want to!

Want to report a bug or just say hello? Contact us at protagonist@smokesomefrogs.com :)

Links

• Website

• Twitter

• Press Kit

Version 1.1.1 has some minor changes to it - a new worker and some little fixes :)

System requirements: Recommended is a G3900 (2.8 ghz) and 2 gb of Ram but you can play it without any problem on much weaker systems.

For parents: This game contains a lot of weird jokes which aren't kid friendly. Play it one time before you give it to your kids.

If you like this game, you can check out our gamejam game: Run for Love c:
